title: GrownUpWords Component Props
description: Schema for the GrownUpWords component that maps simplified terms to technical terminology

terms.description: List of technical term mappings (minimum 5 per chapter)

context_example.description: Sentence showing the technical term used in real context

why_technical_term_exists.description: Optional explanation of why the technical term exists or what it stands for

expandable.description: Whether to make the glossary collapsible

terms.context_example: The engineer said: 'We use ROS2 to coordinate the robot's movements.'
terms.why_technical_term_exists: ROS2 stands for Robot Operating System 2 - it's a shorter way to say 'the system that helps robot parts communicate.'
